00011 #ifndef _FU_UNIQUE_ID_MAP_H_
00012 #define _FU_UNIQUE_ID_MAP_H_

00021 template <typename STRING_BUILDER>
00022 class FUUniqueStringMapT : fm::map<typename STRING_BUILDER::String, void*>
00023 {
00024 private:
00025     typedef fm::map<typename STRING_BUILDER::String, void*> Parent;
00026     typedef typename std::map<typename STRING_BUILDER::String, void*>::iterator iterator;
00027     typedef typename std::map<typename STRING_BUILDER::String, void*>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00028     
00029     const_iterator end() const { return Parent::end(); }
00030 
00031 public:
00036     void AddUniqueString(typename STRING_BUILDER::String& wantedStr);
00037 
00040     bool Exists(const typename STRING_BUILDER::String& str) const;
00041 
00044     void Erase(const typename STRING_BUILDER::String& str);
00045 };
00046 
00047 typedef FUUniqueStringMapT<FUSStringBuilder> FUSUniqueStringMap; 
00048 typedef FUUniqueStringMapT<FUStringBuilder> FUUniqueStringMap; 
00050 template <typename Builder>
00051 void FUUniqueStringMapT<Builder>::AddUniqueString(typename Builder::String& wantedStr)
00052 {
00053     if (Exists(wantedStr))
00054     {
00055         // First, extract any existing number at the end of the name.
00056         size_t numberPosition = 1;
00057         size_t numberValue = 0;
00058         size_t c = wantedStr[wantedStr.length() - 1];
00059         while (c >= '0' && c <= '9')
00060         {
00061             numberValue += (((uint32) c) - '0') * numberPosition;
00062             wantedStr.erase(wantedStr.length() - 1);
00063             numberPosition *= 10;
00064             c = wantedStr[wantedStr.length() - 1];
00065         }
00066         
00067         // Attempt to generate a new string by appending an increasing counter.
00068         size_t counter = max(numberValue, (size_t) 2);
00069         Builder buffer;
00070         buffer.reserve(wantedStr.length() + 8);
00071         static const size_t maxCounter = 256;
00072         do
00073         {
00074             buffer.set(wantedStr);
00075             buffer.append(counter);
00076         } while (counter++ < maxCounter && Exists(buffer.ToString()));
00077         
00078         // Hopefully, this is now unique.
00079         wantedStr = buffer.ToString();
00080     }
00081     insert(typename Parent::value_type(wantedStr, NULL));
00082 }
00083 
00084 template <typename Builder>
00085 bool FUUniqueStringMapT<Builder>::Exists(const typename Builder::String& str) const
00086 {
00087     const_iterator it = find(str);
00088     return it != end();
00089 }
00090 
00091 template <typename Builder>
00092 void FUUniqueStringMapT<Builder>::Erase(const typename Builder::String& str)
00093 {
00094     iterator it = find(str);
00095     if (it != end()) erase(it);
00096 }

00098 #endif // _FU_UNIQUE_ID_MAP_H_
